meanings.definition: A person who examines and treats the eyes.
meanings.sent1: The oculist checked my eyes for any problems.
meanings.sent2: I have an appointment with the oculist next week for an eye exam.
meanings.sent3: The oculist made me wear funny glasses during the eye test.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in diagnosing eye conditions made her the oculist to go to.
meanings.sent5: The oculist's clinic was filled with colorful eye charts and diagrams.

meanings.definition: A medical professional specializing in eye care.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather visits the oculist regularly for his glaucoma treatment.
meanings.sent2: The oculist prescribed me new glasses to improve my vision.
meanings.sent3: The oculist's office had a wall full of framed eye diplomas.
meanings.sent4: She was the oculist who could see beyond the surface and understand eye health deeply.
meanings.sent5: The oculist's expertise in eye surgeries was well-known in the community.
